item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description:
"A little girl without a doll is almost as unhappy, and quite as impossible, as a woman without children."
from chapter VIII of Les Miserables" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor hugo
item.description: "Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent" -- Victor hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "What Is Love? I have met in the streets a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, the water passed through his shoes and the stars through his soul" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "To learn to read is to light a fire; every syllable that is spelled out is a spark." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "People do not lack strength, they lack will." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "What is said about men often has as much influence upon their lives, and especially upon their destinies, as what they do." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Love is the only future God offers." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Erin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Erin add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Erin add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Erin add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Erin add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Erin add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Erin add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Erin add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Erin add a quote by Charles Eames
item.description: "Eventually everything connects - people, ideas, objects. The quality of the connections is the key to quality per se." -- Charles Eames
